pages.title: ORSA EVA Survival Suit
pages.text: $(bold)ORSA Mk.III Extra-Vehicular Activity Suit$()$(br2)The pinnacle of ORSA engineering. Sealed air loop, cryogenic insulation, and a Frozen Heart power core. Provides $(bold)cold resistance through Phase 5-6$() and vacuum protection.$(br2)$(italic)This suit costs more than your house. Your old house. The one that's now a glacier.$()

pages.title: Specifications
pages.text: $(bold)Protection:$() Each piece adds +30°C. Full set provides $(bold)+120°C total$().$(br2)$(bold)Rated for:$() Phase 1-6 surface conditions$(br)$(bold)Bonus:$() Negates wind chill. Full set protects from suffocation.$(br)$(bold)Limitation:$() In late Phase 6, you also need $(l:orsa_equipment/o2_canisters)O2 Canisters$(/l) for breathable air.$(br2)$(italic)ORSA Legal: This suit is on loan. Returning it in pieces counts as "damaged."$()

pages.title: Crafting Notes
pages.text: Requires Tier 2 heavy insulation as a base, ice shards, blue ice, and — for the chestplate — a $(bold)Frozen Heart$() power core.$(br2)Yes, you need to brave the frozen surface to gather materials. Yes, we see the problem.$(br2)$(italic)ORSA Engineering: "It builds character."$()
The chestplate requires a Frozen Heart core. Don't worry, it's not YOUR heart.
